description: Table showing the expenditure incurred a) by the Ministry of Justice in refurbishing the Supreme Court Building, b) new capital investment and refurbishment of property for the years 2005/06/ to 2007/08, c) by Her Majesty's Prison Service on new capital investment/refurbishment of property for the years 1998/99 to 2007/08 broken down by the project. 10 p.
